sentences.sContent: I went to the hospital for a check-up this morning.
sentences.sContent_eng: I went to the hospital for a check-up this morning.
sentences.sCn: 今天早上我到医院去做了一次检查。

sentences.sContent: Conclusion Taking full advantage of media and personal communication measures, we should strengthen health education for TB patients during check-up, treatment and supervision.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusion Taking full advantage of media and personal communication measures, we should strengthen health education for TB patients during check-up, treatment and supervision.
sentences.sCn: 结论应结合检查治疗督导，充分利用媒体和人际传播手段，加强对结核病患者的健康教育。

sentences.sContent: So, female friends must hide nothing from thy physician, regular gynaecological check-up can let we detected gynecological diseases, thus coming on earlier will complete cure disease.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, female friends must hide nothing from thy physician, regular gynaecological check-up can let we detected gynecological diseases, thus coming on earlier will complete cure disease.
sentences.sCn: 所以，女性朋友千万不要讳疾忌医，定期做妇科检查可以让我们及时的发现妇科疾病，从而在发病初期将疾病完全治愈。

phrases.pCn: n. 健康检查；身体检查
